text: Ara kaphirara bale, 'amadera kache kiyamata asabe na.' Baluna, abasya'i hyam, sapatha amara rabera, niscaya tomadera kache ta asabe.â€™ Tini gayeba samparke samyaka parijnata; asamanasamuha o yamine tamra agocare naya anu parimana kichu kimba tara ceye chota ba bara kichu; era pratyekati'i ache suspasta kitabe
